userUtterance.text: what is required to update my name on uportal

requestBody.query: what is required to update my name on uportal

200.answer: Please contact Universal Account Servicing, LLC Customer Care: 1-888-233-2302.

snippets.text: Q: What is required to update my name or other account information that i am not able to edit on the uportal360? A: Please contact Universal Account Servicing, LLC Customer Care: 1-888-233-2302. Depending on what information that you are needing to update, we will require that you send us a copy of one of these documents that includes the information that you are requesting to be changed: Social Security Card, W-2 Form, Current driver's license, Passport, Birth Certificate, Unexpired U.S. Military ID, State ID, U.S. Military discharge papers (Form DD214), U.S. Certificate of Naturalization (Form N-550 or N-570), U.S. Certificate of Citizenship (Form N 560 or N-561), Court order, Alien Registration Card (Form I-551 or I-151), Marriage certificate Please send your documentation to: PO BOX 12027 Parkville, MO 64152 Q: Notice to student loan borrowers of alternative repayment arrangements A:
snippets.title: faq done

agentUtterance.text:
Please contact Universal Account Servicing, LLC Customer Care: 1-888-233-2302,

Depending on the info you want to change, we will need additional documents that confirm the info you are changing to be sent to PO BOX 12027, Parkville, MO 64152

userUtterance.text: what is an example of some documents i could send?

requestBody.query: what is an example of some documents i could send?

200.answer: Examples of documents you can send include: Social Security Card, W-2 Form, Current driver's license, Passport, Birth Certificate, Unexpired US Military ID, State ID, US Military discharge papers (Form DD214), US Certificate of Naturalization (Form N-550 or N-570), US Certificate of Citizenship (Form N 560 or N-561), Court order, Alien Registration Card (Form I-551 or I-151), Marriage certificate

snippets.text: Depending on what information that you are needing to update, we will require that you send us a copy of one of these documents that includes the information that you are requesting to be changed: Social Security Card, W-2 Form, Current driver's license, Passport, Birth Certificate, Unexpired US Military ID, State ID, US Military discharge papers (Form DD214), US Certificate of Naturalization (Form N-550 or N-570), US Certificate of Citizenship (Form N 560 or N-561), Court order, Alien Registration Card (Form I-551 or I-151), Marriage certificate Please send your documentation to: PO BOX 12027 Parkville, MO 64152 Q: Notice to student loan borrowers of alternative repayment arrangements A: This notice is specific to student loan borrowers regarding certain alternative repayment and/or hardship arrangements for which you may be eligible.
snippets.title: faq done
